articles.description: Unreal Engine 5 was just shown running on a PlayStation 5 console. Ahead of the PS5's late 2020 launch, here's everything else we know about it.
articles.content: We aren't even halfway through 2020 yet, and Sony has already revealed several details regarding the PS5, its next-generation console. We've learned about the console's technical specs, as well as it… [+19747 chars]
